message: I kind of want to get rid of that limit but then we might run into ui issues
You probably already run into UI issues, just without realizing it. Browsers can be small windows ;)
When you are a member of 20 or more groups, you can not join existing groups. You can, however, still create groups. This feels like a bug.
A limitation also makes it difficult to scale once you get to a larger community. I can easily come up with more than 20 legitimate topics / areas of interest I'd want to subscribe to, somehow
Of course, that begets the problem of making the unread counts manageable, but I think that's an existing problem regardless of limitation (just compounded by it)
